name: dotingly

in a way that shows a lot of love for someone, often when you think this is silly or annoying: He watched dotingly as the child climbed all over the furniture. He seemed to be dotingly infatuated with her. Related words

More examplesFewer examplesShe always talked dotingly of her youngest grandson.His mother patted his arm dotingly. If parents dotingly do everything for their children, they may be harming their confidence.She lifted his chin with her finger and smiled dotingly at him.I don't know why they are so dotingly proud of their city.
